SELECT board.id , board.deleted , board.created_at as createdAt , board.modified_at as modifiedAt
, board.user_id as userId , board.title , board.content , board.countread
, user.username as userUsername , user.nick as userNick , user.img as userImg
FROM board, user WHERE board.id = #{id} AND board.user_id = user.id
mapper.sql: WHERE board.id is not NULL AND board.deleted = #{deleted} AND board.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59') >= board.created_at AND board.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
mapper.select: SELECT count(board.id) as listsize FROM board

SELECT board.id FROM board
ORDER BY board.id ORDER BY board.title DESC ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}

SELECT board.id FROM board
AND #{cursor} > board.id ORDER BY board.id DESC
AND board.id > #{cursor} ORDER BY board.id ASC
AND #{mark} > CONCAT(board.title, '_', board.id) ORDER BY board.title DESC
AND CONCAT(board.title, '_', board.id) > #{mark} ORDER BY board.title ASC
LIMIT 0, #{perpage}
